instructions: Knead for 5-10 minutes until dough clears bowl. It will be wet. Let rise for 1 hour then divide and form balls. Let rest while the oven heats, 15-20 minutes. Roll out then brush with butter or olive oil if wanted and bake at 500F for 4-5 minutes or fry on medium heat with a little oil or butter.
name: Flatbread
